post:
A new holiday a new deal!  This time we are going all out!

For over 1 and a half years we have hosted top quality VPSs with matching support.  Today we are offering everyone the chance to have one of our best quality VPSs at rock bottom prices.  This new offer makes our lowest VPS package come to only $5.57 a month, but be quick, this offer will finish at the end of the month so get in before stocks run out.  

We are hosted out of BurstNET datacenter and running OpenVZ virtualization.  We offer a 7 day money back guarantee if you aren't 100% happy with the service.  

Coupon code:  [b]BUNNY[/b]


VPS 1.0 Package:

Dedicated RAM: 128MB
Burstable RAM: 512MB
Disk Space: 30GB 
Bandwidth: Unmetered!
IPV4 Addresses: 1 (IPv4)
IPV6 Addresses: 5 (IPv6) 
Connection Port: 1Gb/s
Cores: 4 (Shared)
FREE SETUP: $5.57/MONTH (After Coupon)
ORDER NOW: https://billing.rethinkvps.com/cart.php?pid=2

Test IP's & Speedtest files: http://rethinkvps.com/speedtest.php

If you have any questions please post them below.
